snippet: The former soldier was sentenced to 10 months in federal prison for entering into the marriage so he could get additional military benefits and his Jamaican bride could become a legal immigrant.
abstract: Former soldier Joshua Priest is sentenced to 10 months in federal prison for entering into a sham marriage so that he could get additional military benefits and his Jamaican bride could become a legal immigrant.
lead_paragraph: The former soldier was sentenced to 10 months in federal prison for entering into the marriage so he could get additional military benefits and his Jamaican bride could become a legal immigrant.

headline.main: Kansas: Ex-Soldier Is Sentenced for Sham Marriage to Immigrant
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Ex-Soldier Is Sentenced For Sham Marriage to Immigrant
